title: Savage Storm
description: Mayhem is coming for the Knight's Legion MC…Madeline. My Angel. The light to my darkness. As President of the Knight’s Legion MC, death and destruction come with the territory—this club is my life. Then she comes along and casts a spell on me with her innocent blue eyes. A healing balm to my soul. Powerful enough to chase away my demons.Caught up in an MC war is no place for a wholesome kindergarten teacher. No place for an Angel. What if she sees the savage monster in me? But walking away isn’t an option. From the first touch, I’m doomed. Swallowed up by her goodness.Claiming Madeline is the only way to keep her safe. And make her mine.Warning: A heart-wrenching cliffhanger, with a long-awaited HEA in book two, Avenging Angel. NOT a standalone.**This series contains some dark elements. Reader discretion advised.**
author: Naomi Porter
